src_text: Tsebi o ya Seemo sa Coronavirus (COVID-19)
trg_text: Update on Coronavirus (COVID-19)

src_text: Kua kopanong ya yona ye swerwego ka Laboraro, 10 Phupu 2020, Kabinete e amoget e pego ya tshedimo o ya moragorago go t wa go Lekgotlataelo la Boset haba ka ga Coronavirus (NCCC).
trg_text: At its virtual meeting held on Wednesday, 10 June 2020, Cabinet received an updated report from the National Coronavirus Command Council (NCCC).

src_text: NCCC e
trg_text: National Petroleum Company

src_text: i int e dit hi inyo t e bonagalago t a go amana le Maemo a Boraro ao a kaonafet ego a go lekanet wa kgahlanong le kotsi mabapi le go tswalelwa ga naga ka bopharDit hi inyo t e di ikadile godimo ga ditlhagi o t e dirilwego ke mafapha a go fapafapana gotee le dipoledi ano t e ahlaahlilwego ke Setheo sa Boset haba sa Ditiragalo t a Mohlakanelwa le sa Bohlodi (NATJOINTS).
trg_text: The NCCC tabled a number of recommendations pertaining to the enhanced risk adjusted Alert Level 3 of the national lockdow The recommendations are based on submissions made by various sectors and deliberations by the National Joint Operational and Intelligence Structur

src_text: Le ge go le bjalo, Kabinete e t eere sephetho sa go fega go dumelelwa ga dit hi inyo t e go sa letet we pego yeo e felet ego ya phetleko ya maphelo go t wa go Komitikelet o ya t a Maphelo ya Tona Mabapi le COVID-19.
trg_text: However, Cabinet decided to defer approval of the recommendations pending a full health assessment report from the Ministerial Health Advisory Committee on COVID-19.

src_text: Go letet we gore NCCC e amogele tlhagi o yeo e felet ego mathomong a beke ye tlag
trg_text: The NCCC is expected to receive the full presentation by early next wee

src_text: Kabinete e sant e e dira boipilet o le go hlohlelet a maAfrika Borwa ka moka go latela le go ithaopa go obamela magato ao a hlomilwego go lwant hana le go phatlalala ga COVID-19.
trg_text: Cabinet once again appeal to and urge all South Africans to adhere and voluntarily comply with measures put in place to combat the spread of COVID-19.

src_text: Khamphani ya Boset haba ya Petroleamo
trg_text: Cabinet was briefed on the ongoing work to rationalize all petroleum (oil and gas) subsidiaries of the state owned diversified energy company, Central Energy Fun

src_text: Kabinete e sedimo it we ka mo omo wo kgatlampanago wa go gopodi i a makalakgwebo ka moka a petroleamo (a oli le a gase) a khamphani ya enet i ya ditirelokgwebo t a go fapafapana yeo e laolwago ke mmu o, e bago Central Energy Fun
trg_text: The rationalization will result in three subsidiaries (PetroSA, Strategic Fuel Fund and iGas) merged into one single National Petroleum Compan This gives effect to the announcement made by President Cyril Ramaphosa in his State of the Nation Address on 13 February 2020, to repurpose and rationalize a number of state-owned enterprises to support growth and developmen

src_text: Phelet o ya kgopodi i o ye e tla ba gore makalakgwebo a mararo (PetroSA, Strategic Fuel Fund le iGas) a momaganywe goba selo se tee e lego Khamphani ya Boset haba ya Petroleam Se se kgont ha tsebagat o ye dirilwego ke Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa Polelong ya gagwe ka Maemo a Set haba ya la 13 Dibokwane 2020, e lego go feto a morero le go gopodi i a palo ye bonagalago ya dikgwebo t e laolwago ke mmu o go thekga kgolo le tlhaboll
trg_text: Such a scheme will protect the vulnerable depositors and ensure minimal disruptions to the financial system and broader economy when such institutions enter into financial distres APPOINTMENTMs Sekgothadi Kabelo as Non-Executive Director of the Ports Regulator of South Africa BoarEnquiries: Ms Phumla Williams

src_text: Kabinete e dumelet e go thwalwa ga khamphani ya ditsebi t a peakanyoleswa yeo e
trg_text: Cabinet approved the GBV Policy Framework in Post-School Education and Training Syste The policy framework seeks to respond to the increased number of GBV-related cases at institutions of higher learnin

src_text: omago fela ka dikhamphani t e momagant wego gore e nyakolle mmotlolo wo o ka phethagat wago kaonekaone wa Khamphani ye ya Boset haba ya Petroleamo
trg_text: Cabinet approved the proposed appointment of a professional restructuring company that specializes in mergers to investigate the most viable model of this single National Petroleum Compan 3.

src_text: Tlhako ya Pholisi ya Dikgaruru t a go Ikala ka Bong (GBV) Dithutong t a ka Morago ga Marematlou le ka go t a ka Peakanyo ya Tlhahlo
trg_text: Gender-Based Violence (GBV) Policy Framework in Post-School Education and Training System

src_text: Kabinete e dumelet e Tlhako ya Pholisi ya GBV Dithutong t a ka morago ga Marematlou le ka go t a ka Peakanyong ya Tlhahl Tlhako ye ya pholisi e
trg_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the Financial Sector Laws Amendment Bill of 2020 to Parliamen The Bill proposes to designate the SARB as the Resolution Authority, and enhances the SARB s regulatory tools for discharging its statutory mandate of ensuring stability of the financial syste

src_text: et ane le go arabela palo yeo e hlatloget ego godimo ya melato ya go amana le GBV ditheong t a thuto ya godim
trg_text: The policy framework provides guidance on structures, mechanisms and processes that institutions of higher learning must put in place to prevent incidents of GBV in their campuse In addition to providing oversight structures, it also compels such institutions to create awareness on their GBV policie 4.

src_text: Tlhako ye ya pholisi e fana ka tlhahlo ya dihlongwa, mekgwa le ditshepedi o t eo ditheo t a thuto ya godimo di swanet ego go di hloma go efoga ditiragalo t a GBV dikhamphaseng t a t on Go tlalelet a godimo ga go aba dihlongwa t a go lekola mo omo wo dirilwego, tlhako ye ya pholisi e gapelet a t ona ditheo t e go lemo a batho ka dipholisi t a t ona t a GBV
trg_text: Cabinet approved the implementation of the National Khoi and San Heritage Route, which is a national legacy projec The route will identify, highlight, conserve and promote the heritage of the Khoi, Nama, Griekwa, Khorana and Sa This project contributes towards the acknowledgement of the previously neglected and marginalized South African histor

src_text: Pego ka Dinyaki i o t a Kgonagalo ya go Aga Musiamo wa RLM
trg_text: Feasibility Study Report on the Resistance and Liberation Movement Museum (RLMM)

src_text: Kabinete e dumelet e Pego ka Dinyaki i o t a Kgonagalo ya go Aga Musiamo wa Ditiragalo t a go Ema Kgahlanong le Kgethologanyo le t a go Lwela Tokologo (RLMM).
trg_text: Cabinet approved the Feasibility Study Report on the establishment of the RLM The museum will contribute towards conserving the history of the resistance and liberation struggle in South Afric

src_text: Musiamo wo o tla kgatha tema ya go babalela histori ya ditiragalo t a go Ema Kgahlanong le Kgethologanyo le t a go Lwela Tokologo ka mono Afrika Borw
trg_text: The study, which Cabinet approved in 2015, was commissioned within the context of the Resistance and Liberation Heritage Route (RLHR) Projec The RLHR contributes towards the development and transformation of the South African heritage landscap

src_text: Dinyaki i o t e, t eo di dumelet wego ke Kabinete ka 2015, di thomilwe go lebelet we seemo sa Prot eke ya Lesolo la Pabalelo le Bohwa bja Naga mo Ditiragalo t a go Ema Kgahlanong le Kgethologanyo le t a go Lwela Tokologo (RLHR).
trg_text: It also gives effect to the Traditional and Khoi-San Leadership Act, 2019 (Act 3 of 2019), which legislate for the recognition of the Khoi and San traditional leaders

src_text: RLHR e thu a ka tlhabollo le go feto wa ga merero ya bohwa nageng ya Afrika Borw
trg_text: Cabinet approved the designs of the 2021 and 2022 commemorative circulation coins which are issued by the South African Reserve Bank (SARB) and the South African Mint Compan

src_text: Ge o fedit we go agwa, musiamo wo o tla lota tlhatlamano ya ditiragalo t a bohwa (t eo di bonagalago le t a go se bonagale) le go fana ka tlhathollo yeo e swanago, kelelo ya t ona le maitemogelo a go amana le diphenkgi ano t a tokologo ka mo Afrika Borwa
trg_text: Once completed, the museum will conserve a series of heritage elements (tangible and intangible) and provide common narrative, memory and experiences relating to the liberation struggle in South Africa

src_text: Lesolo la Boset haba la Bohwa bja Merafe ya Masarwa

src_text: Kabinete e dumelet e go phethagat wa ga Lesolo la Boset haba la Bohwa bja Merafe ya Masarwa, e lego prot eke ya bohwa bja boset hab Lesolo le
trg_text: The Bill proposes a new framework to resolve financial institutions, primarily banks, when they enter a period of financial distres It also introduces South Africa s first comprehensive deposit insurance scheme that will ensure that depositors are paid their funds when a bank fail

src_text: Pabalelo ye e kgont ha gape le Molao wa Set o le Mago i a Merafe ya Masarwa 2019 (Molao 3 wa 2019), wo o beago molaong temogo ya Mago i a Merafe ya Masarwa

src_text: Meakanyet o ya Dikhoine t a Meketeko ya 2021 le ya 2022
trg_text: Designs of 2021 and 2022 commemorative coins

src_text: Kabinete e dumelet e meakanyet o ya dikhoine t a phatlalat o t a meketeko ya 2012 le ya 2022 t eo di lokollwago ke Panka ya Resefe ya Afrika Borwa (SARB) le Khamphani ya Afrika Borwa ya go bopa T helet
trg_text: Financial Sector Laws Amendment Bill of 2020

src_text: Khoine ya R5 ya phatlalat o ya meketeko le ya R5 ya morumo wa silibere le khoine ya serekelele sa gauta yeo e ka kgoboket wago e tla lokollwa ka 2021 go keteka mengwaga ye lekgolo go tloga mola SARB e thakgolwag Tatelano ya bone ya Khoine ya Tesimale ya Afrika Borwa, yeo e tla lokollwago ka 2022 e tla phatlalat wa ka dikhoine t a 10c, 20c, 50c, R1, R2 le R5.
